description:
**Still GREAT deals for February and March!!**
Same low price for 1 to 4 Guests, no extra like other listings!!

Beautiful Studio Loft, a NEW YORK "experience", High ceilings, brick walls, en located in the heart of lower Manhattan, Financial District. Steps from 9/11 Memorial and EVERYTHING THIS AMAZING AREA HAS TO OFFER!

***I can host you last minute ! Same day bookings are ok until late in the evening **

Beautiful Studio Loft, a NEW YORK "experience", High ceilings, brick walls, en located in the heart of lower Manhattan, Financial District. Steps from 9/11 Memorial and EVERYTHING THIS AMAZING AREA HAS TO OFFER!

My Loft Studio is great space for up to 4 Guests, 2 on each bed, or a perfect set up for a couple. I would like to offer it for a very low price no matter the quantity of guests.

- Full Size Bed on the sleeping area above.
- Full Size futon SofaBed 
- Dining Table for up to 4, with 2 chairs.
- Fully stocked kitchen with dinnerware, glasses, wine glasses, many small appliances for cooking, baking, frying, etc.

I like to provide high quality towels, linens and CK pillows. 

IMPORTANT TO CONSIDER ABOUT CHECK-IN TIME: If you are planning to Check-in after hours, a late check-in fee will be applied for evening hours as follow: ( to be paid in cash upon arrival, Thank you)
6:00PM – 11:59PM = $20
12:00AM – 8:00AM = $40

Please ask me if you have any questions!
Looking forward to host you,
Thank you

I will be available during your stay to offer any help or provide local info.

IMPORTANT TO CONSIDER ABOUT CHECK-IN TIME: If you are planning to Check-in after hours, a late check-in fee will be applied for evening hours as follow: ( to be paid in cash upon arrival, Thank you)
6:00PM – 11:59PM = $20
12:00AM – 8:00AM = $40
name: LOFT High Ceilings + Brick Walls FiDi 9/11 4 Guest
review: Quiet, clean building, very close to the 9/11 Memorial and multiple subway stops.
